channel.title: hugo on vblinden
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on vblinden

item.title: Never. Forget. Backups.
item.description: Unfortunately DigitalOcean had a node failure yesterday in their AMS3 data center. And sadly my virtual machine running my blog was on there and I didn’t have backups enabled. So all my data is permanently gone. Which is not a huge problem, because I only had two small blog posts on here. So today I decided to make my blog a static website using Hugo.
